column4: Telecom Italia says has no plans to sell TIM Brasil
column5: MILAN  Dec 2 Telecom Italia has had no contact with potential buyers of its stake in Brazilian unit TIM Participacoes and has no plans to sell  it said on Monday  dismissing press reports about a possible deal.

column4: Toyota says Nov China auto sales up 40.7 pct y/y
column5: BEIJING  Dec 2 Toyota Motor Corp and its two local joint-venture partners sold about 89 800 automobiles in China in November  up 40.7 percent from a year earlier  the Japanese automaker said on Monday.

column4: Fitch Memberikan Peringkat Obligasi Rupiah TAFS 'AAA(idn)'
column5: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) JAKARTA/TAIPEI/SINGAPORE  December 02 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings memberikan peringkat  Nasional Jangka Panjang di 'AAA(idn)' dan Nasional Jangka Pendek di 'F1+(idn)'  atas program obligasi senior berkelanjutan yang akan diterbitkan oleh PT Toyota  Astra Financial Services (TAFS; 'AAA(idn)'/Stabil) sebesar maksimum 4 trilyun  rupiah. Fitch juga menetapkan peringkat atas obligasi senior rupiah tahap I yang akan  dikeluarkan dibawah program ini

column4: Fitch Rates TAFS' Senior Bond 'AAA(idn)'; Outlook Stable
column5: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) JAKARTA/TAIPEI/SINGAPORE  December 01 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned  Indonesia-based PT Toyota Astra Financial Services's (TAFS; 'AAA(idn)'/Stable)  senior unsecured debt programme of up to IDR4trn a National Long-Term (LT)  rating of 'AAA(idn)' and a National Short-Term (ST) rating of 'F1+(idn)'.  Fitch has also rated TAFS's proposed rupiah senior unsecured bond  the first  tranche to be issued under the programme  as follows: - b

column4: Thyssen shares plunge as US and stainless steel deals disappoint
column5: FRANKFURT  Dec 2 Shares in ThyssenKrupp  plunged in early Monday trading after the company announced over the weekend the sale of its U.S. steel plant  a deal to take back stainless steel assets it sold last year and plans for a capital increase.

column4: Earlier-than-usual online deals to steal Cyber Monday thunder
column5: NEW YORK  Dec 2 Earlier than usual online holiday discounts are expected to dampen today's Cyber Monday sales in the United States.

column4: Chernin buys anime site Crunchyroll to expand online video assets
column5: Dec 2 The Chernin Group  former News Corp  president Peter Chernin's holding company  said on Monday it had acquired majority control of Japanese anime streaming service Crunchyroll  expanding holdings that include stakes in online video company Fullscreen and mobile entertainment network Scopely.

column4: Comcast tests new ad tech to help networks capture binge viewers
column5: Comcast Corp  the largest U.S. cable operator  is testing new advertising technology that inserts up-to-date commercials into past episodes of TV shows that are available on demand  a development that could help television networks generate additional revenue.

column4: Comcast tests new ad tech to help networks capture binge viewers
column5: Dec 2 Comcast Corp  the largest U.S. cable operator  is testing new advertising technology that inserts up-to-date commercials into past episodes of TV shows that are available on demand  a development that could help television networks generate additional revenue.

column4: India's Wipro to buy U.S. mortgage services firm for $75 million
column5: BANGALORE Wipro Ltd.   India's No. 3 IT services provider  has agreed to purchase U.S.-based mortgage services provider Opus Capital Markets Consultants LLC for $75 million to boost its offerings for financial services clients.

column4: India's Wipro to buy US mortgage services firm for $75 million
column5: BANGALORE  Dec 2 Wipro Ltd.  India's No. 3 IT services provider  has agreed to purchase U.S.-based mortgage services provider Opus Capital Markets Consultants LLC for $75 million to boost its offerings for financial services clients.

column4: Yamana Gold to invest $450 million in Argentine mine
column5: BUENOS AIRES  Dec 2 Canadian-based gold miner Yamana Gold Inc will invest $450 million dollars to bring a gold mine in Patagonia on stream  by the end of 2015  the Argentine government said on Monday.

column4: Yum's November KFC China sales flat  sees 2014 earnings rebound
column5: Yum Brands Inc  said November sales at established KFC restaurants in China  its top market  failed to grow despite a successful half-priced chicken promotion  and it forecast a return to earnings per share growth in 2014.

column4: UPDATE 1-Yum's November KFC China sales flat  sees 2014 earnings rebound
column5: Dec 2 Yum Brands Inc said November sales at established KFC restaurants in China  its top market  failed to grow despite a successful half-priced chicken promotion  and it forecast a return to earnings per share growth in 2014.

column4: BRIEF-Yum! Brands up in extended trading after outlook
column5: NEW YORK  Dec 2 Yum Brands Inc :  * Shares rise 1.6 percent in extended trading after outlook
